metadata.title: CVE-2016-5735 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the rwpng_read_image24_libpng function in rwpng.c inpngquant 2.7.0 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via acrafted PNG file, which triggers a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: pngquant: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
